feature.name: Running Mean of Zero Crossings Overall Standard Deviation
feature.description: Running Mean of Zero Crossings. The number of times the waveform changed sign. An indication of frequency as well as noisiness. This is the overall standard deviation over all windows.

feature.name: Standard Deviation of Zero Crossings Overall Standard Deviation
feature.description: Standard Deviation of Zero Crossings.The number of times the waveform changed sign. An indication of frequency as well as noisiness. This is the overall standard deviation over all windows.
